title: CRAFTSMAN Pliers, 8 & 10-Inch, 2-Piece Groove Joint Set (CMHT82547), Red
description: This 8-inch and 10-inch Groove Joint Pliers Set is made from drop-forged steel for strength and durability. The multi-zone, bi-material grips on CRAFTSMAN pliers set allow for dedicated comfort and secure grip zones. The precision machined jaws of chanel locks pliers are ideal for twisting, gripping, holding, and cutting a variety of shapes and sizes.
